definition: curdled milk or fruit juice/also pr. [luo4]

sentences.english: Hast thou not milked me as milk, and curdled me like cheese?
sentences.chinese: 所有的奶酪都来自凝结的牛奶。

sentences.english: Moreover, bean curd cheese cake is also wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 此外，用豆腐做成的奶酪蛋糕也是特棒的。

sentences.english: Some of the most notable cheeses of the world are Brie and Roquefort .
sentences.chinese: 世界最著名的奶酪是法国布里奶酪和羊乳奶酪。

sentences.english: Some of the most notable cheeses of the world are Brie and Roquefort .
sentences.chinese: 世界最著名的奶酪是法国布里奶酪和羊乳奶酪。

sentences.english: Some of the most notable cheeses of the world are Brie and Roquefort .
sentences.chinese: 世界最著名的奶酪是法国布里奶酪和羊乳奶酪。

sentences.english: Then they would sit down to nibble on the cheese.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们才会坐下来咀嚼奶酪。

sentences.english: A hostess apologized to her guest for serving a pie without any cheese.
sentences.chinese: 女主人为馅饼里没放奶酪向客人道歉。

sentences.english: The finish is long and supple. Creamy pasta dishes, quiches or with cheese.
sentences.chinese: 这款酒是奶油意大利面或奶酪的最佳搭配。

sentences.english: Some experts believe it is excessive intake of dairy foods, especially the cheese-related.
sentences.chinese: 有专家认为它与过多摄入乳类食品，尤其是奶酪有关。

sentences.english: And then stir in the cheese and bread crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 之后加入奶酪和面包碎搅拌。

sentences.english: Juan Guarda Tempranillo is excellent with meat, cheese and Italian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 最适合佐餐肉类，奶酪和意大利美食。

sentences.english: They sprinkle their cheese on top and make happy faces with their pepperoni.
sentences.chinese: 他们在表面上撒上奶酪，把香肠摆成笑脸的样子。

sentences.english: Low-Glycemic-index vegetables are allowed as well as low-fat cheese, nuts, eggs.
sentences.chinese: 低血糖指数的蔬菜被允许以及低脂奶酪，坚果，鸡蛋。

sentences.english: There, the wind carried a whiff from the cheeses full on to our steed.
sentences.chinese: 风把一股子奶酪的气味直吹向我们的骏马。

sentences.english: Recommendations with red meat, grilled and cooked cheese.
sentences.chinese: 建议搭配红肉，烧烤和熟奶酪饮用。
